0K0.F.summary: R22 S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the hosting, omnichannel communication, and telecommunication activities in Poland. Its Hosting segment is involved in the hosting activities in the forms of shared hosting, VPS, and dedicated servers; sale and maintenance of Internet domains; and provision of value added services, including SSL certificates. The company's Omnichannel Communication segment provides Software as a Service platform services for handling, preparing, processing, and automatic distribution of mobile messages and email messages. Its Telecommunication segment offers Internet access for households, and other services, such as phone and TV services under the Oxylion brand; and Voice over Internet Protocol services, such as queuing, virtual conference rooms, etc. The company serves retail customers, small and medium enterprises, and organizations, as well as large business customers. R22 S.A. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Poznan, Poland.

75Y.F.summary: Comarch S.A. designs, implements, and integrates IT solutions worldwide. Its solutions include Internet of Things (IoT) connectivity and solution management, analytics platform, and billing system; digital sales and customer care, and real time data control and presentation; B2B self-enablement platform, and sales and ordering; enterprise billing, charging, and revenue management; network provisioning, real time OSS-SDN/NFV orchestration, self-organizing network, and intelligent assurance and analytics; inventory management, network planning and design, auto-discovery and reconciliation, configuration management, and network consolidation; and professional services. The company also provides small business and corporate banking, factoring, trade finance, wealth management, digital insurance, anti-money laundering, identity and access management, transaction protection, and ERP solutions. In addition, it offers ERGO supporting system; platform that supports electronic and paper flow of documents; e-Office, an online public service platform; ERP class integrated IT system; smart parking; security platform; eRecording; and video terminal solutions. Further, the company provides loyalty programs, marketing campaign management, employee motivation management, electronic data interchange, business information, document management, sales process management support systems, and mobile applications. Additionally, it offers solutions for IT systems for hospitals; software products for health record management in medical facilities; IOT solutions and its components; short series manufacturing of electronics; services for the automotive industry, such as software development, infotainment in-car, integration with smartphones, e-mobility, and UX/UI; certification tools; embedded systems; and outsourcing solutions. The company is also involved in the sports activities. Comarch S.A. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in KrakÃ³w, Poland.

7GS.F.summary: OPTeam SpÃ³lka Akcyjna provides IT solutions for enterprises, universities, and public administration units in Poland. The company offers higher education solutions, such as electronic academic service platform EDU web360, student and doctoral IDs, attendance lists, laboratories and research centers, and room reservation systems; conference and academic career service systems; e-learning platform; virtual student assistant OPTIbot; and Dean's office system USOS. It also provides PUBLIC web360 Web platform, UBLIC web360 employee portal, and electronic school ID solutions; business products, including Comarch ERP XL, ERP Optima, WMS, BI Point, and Altum, as well as timeline production management, RFID evacuation supervision, and fiscal sales systems; IT solutions and systems for the energy and gas sector comprises of ECI telecom synchronous transport networks, Neptune ECI packet-optical transport data, Apollo ECI optical multi-service transport, and technical documentation archive; and universal IT solutions consisting of WEBCON - Electronic workflow and OPTIpass Worker Card System. The company was formerly known as Optimus-Comfort Sp. z o.o. and changed its name to OPTeam SpÃ³lka Akcyjna in May 2003. OPTeam SpÃ³lka Akcyjna was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Jasionka, Poland.

CPN.F.summary: Sygnity S.A. provides IT products and services in Poland and internationally. The company engages in the production, purchase, and sale of integrated IT systems, infrastructure, and hardware for the banking, finance, insurance, industry and energy, and public administration sectors. It also offers spatial information, geodesy, and cartography services; supplies software and IT services; and sells software and computer hardware, as well as provides electricity trading services. The company was formerly known as Computerland Poland SA and changed its name to Sygnity S.A. in April 2007. Sygnity S.A. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.
